channel.title: Strategy on Kieran Kilbride-Singh – Remote Product Marketer
channel.description: Recent content in Strategy on Kieran Kilbride-Singh – Remote Product Marketer

item.title: Why company culture makes or breaks remote work
item.description: I spent the last six months working six time zones ahead of the six people on my team. I’ve always put travel as a top priority so I took advantage of my travel-friendly work setup to spend time in Asia. The company I work for isn’t a large or fully-remote company like Bufferor Automattic. Out of a team of seven I’m the only one who regularly works remotely for months on end.
